channel.title: Portfolios on Felipe Torres | Dev Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Felipe Torres | Dev Portfolio

item.title: MIDI Lab
item.description: Exploring the Unity engine as an environment for creating live music visuals through MIDI input.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Kerbal Space Program is a 3D space-vessel building and physics-based spaceflight simulation game released for PC, Playstation 4 and XboxOne.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program 2
item.description: Kerbal Space Program 2 is the sequel for KSP, a 3D space-vessel building and physics-based spaceflight simulation game currently in development by Private Division.

item.title: Don't Drop the Bass
item.description: 3D physics-based, local couch wars game made in Unity about slapping a fish. Released on Steam.

item.title: AR Poster
item.description: Exploring the Unity AR Foundation for image tracking.

item.title: Rift of Raigard
item.description: A 2D base building online multiplayer game for Android and iOS (in development).

item.title: Pale Blergh Dot
item.description: Exploring the THREE.js webgl framework with a mini solar system.

item.title: Procedural highway generator
item.description: Procedural generation of a highway given an array of modules in Unity.

item.title: Character head and eye tracking
item.description: A script component that enables player tracking for a given character’s eyes and head, based on parametrical constraints.

item.title: Bathysphere
item.description: Educational iPad game about discovering and cataloging fish.

item.title: Optimization: Additive scene loader
item.description: A reusable Unity component to use in conjunction with the Cinema Director timeline to additively load scenes in Unity.

item.title: VR crane prototype with Leap Motion input
item.description: VR crane prototype designed to work with the Oculus Rift and Leap Motion input.

item.title: M.I.M.E.
item.description: This game was made for the Ludum Dare #42: “Running out of space”.

item.title: ルーム ᛫ Rūmu
item.description: Global Game Jam 2019: A glimpse of coziness, that reminds us of home.

item.title: ¡Ponte Trucha!
item.description: Android mobile game that teaches children how to pack a GoBag (supply bag for emergency situations).

item.title: VR: Option Selector component
item.description: Different Unity components for displaying an array of options in a VR environment

item.title: Phone Booth Desert
item.description: Experimenting with external calls to the Soundcloud API on a Unity WebGl build.

item.title: Shader: Texture Blending
item.description: A Unity3D shader that blends between two given textures and applies an optional tint color to them. Used primarily for special effects and texture transitioning.

item.title: Pa'Pierre
item.description: Demo 3D platformer game made in Unity3D starring Pierre, a piece of paper.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Global Game Jam 2017: A journey of enlightenment by waving others hello.

item.title: Cheveyo
item.description: Global Game Jam 2016: mobile game about hearing and catching audio.

item.title: Reticle Selection System
item.description: Reusable Unity components to add reticle selection system functionality.

item.title: Room lightmapping
item.description: Lightmapping of a single room with static lights for a project targeted for mobile, both Android and iOS.

item.title: Day night adjuster
item.description: A reusable Unity component to create lighting setting profiles for day or night.

item.title: atrois
item.description: Global Game Jam 2015: 3D platformer game made in Unity3D.
